sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const featuredCourses = [ { id: 1, title: 'Web Development Bootcamp', description: 'Learn full-stack web development from scratch', instructor: 'John Doe', rating: 4.8, students: 1234, price: '$49.99', thumbnail: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200', category: 'Web Development', level: 'Beginner', }, { id: 2, title: 'Data Science Fundamentals', description: 'Master data analysis and machine learning', instructor: 'Jane Smith', rating: 4.7, students: 856, price: '$59.99', thumbnail: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200', category: 'Data Science', level: 'Intermediate', }, { id: 3, title: 'Mobile App Development', description: 'Build iOS and Android apps with React Native', instructor: 'Alex Johnson', rating: 4.9, students: 567, price: '$39.99', thumbnail: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200', category: 'Mobile Development', level: 'Advanced', }, ]; const categories = [ { name: 'Web Development', icon: '🌐', count: 45 }, { name: 'Data Science', icon: '📊', count: 32 }, { name: 'Mobile Development', icon: '📱', count: 28 }, { name: 'Design', icon: '🎨', count: 24 }, { name: 'Business', icon: '💼', count: 36 }, { name: 'Marketing', icon: '📈', count: 19 }, ]; const handleCourseClick = (courseId) => { if (!isAuthenticated) { navigate('/login'); } else { navigate(`/courses/${courseId}`); } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Learn Without Limits

Start, switch, or advance your career with thousands of courses from expert instructors.

Get Started
{/* Featured Courses Section */}

Featured Courses

Explore our most popular courses and start your learning journey today

{featuredCourses.map((course) => (
handleCourseClick(course.id)} className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg overflow-hidden cursor-pointer transform transition duration-300 hover:scale-105" >
{course.category} {course.level}

{course.title}

{course.description}

★ {course.rating} | {course.students} students
{course.price}
))}
{/* Categories Section */}

Browse by Category

Find the perfect course for your career goals

{categories.map((category) => (
{category.icon}

{category.name}

{category.count} Courses

))}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Us?

🎓

Expert Instructors

Learn from industry experts with years of practical experience

📱

Learn Anywhere

Access courses on any device, anytime, anywhere

🏆

Certification

Earn certificates to showcase your skills

); }; export default Home;
